```{python}
#| label: fig-sine-wave-example-1
#| fig-cap: "Visualize plots"
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 4
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 200)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title("Sine Wave Example")
plt.show()
```
